Posts.Content: Jan 20, 2016 02:30PM - edited Jan 20, 2016 03:03PM by Grinataly Hi, I had left mastectomy in PMH last February. My Family doctor who I absolutely trust recommended me to go to PM. I was pretty happy (if I can use this word in that situation) I was with Doctor Leong and his diagnose was 100% confirmed after surgery. By the way, I did genetic test too but after surgery. Good luck!!!
